title: Zootopia 2
description: Brave rabbit cop Judy Hopps and her friend, the fox Nick Wilde, team up again to crack a new case, the most perilous and intricate of their careers.

title: The Devil Wears Prada 2
description: The Devil Wears Prada 2 follows Miranda Priestly's struggle against Emily Charlton, her former assistant turned rival executive, as they compete for advertising revenue amidst declining print media while Miranda nears retirement.

title: Scream 7
description: When a new Ghostface killer emerges in the town where Sidney Prescott has built a new life, her darkest fears are realized as her daughter becomes the next target.

title: Michael
description: The story of the famous musician Michael Jackson, known as the King of Pop.

title: Moana 2
description: Moana embarks on a new ocean voyage beyond the familiar seas, facing ancient dangers and discovering new allies.

title: Wicked
description: The untold story of the witches of Oz, focusing on the unlikely friendship between Elphaba and Glinda.

title: Gladiator II
description: Years after Maximus' death, Lucius is drawn back into the brutal world of the Colosseum and Roman politics.

title: Inside Out 2
description: Riley enters her teenage years and new emotions arrive at headquarters, causing unexpected chaos.

title: Deadpool & Wolverine
description: Deadpool teams up with Wolverine for a multiverse-spanning mission filled with chaos and dark humor.

title: The Wild Robot
description: A robot stranded on an island learns to survive in the wild and form bonds with animals.

title: Alien: Romulus
description: Young people on a distant world uncover the most terrifying life form in the universe.

title: Twisters
description: Storm chasers risk everything to study unprecedented tornado outbreaks across the Midwest.

title: Crime Highway
description: A gritty crime thriller following detectives chasing a serial killer along a notorious highway.

title: Couture
description: A high-fashion drama revealing ambition, rivalry, and secrets behind the scenes of the fashion industry.
